The Grammar of Networks

Lab-11: The Queen of Hearts, She Made some Tarts

The Grammar of Diagrams
We can use R to create complicated diagrams too ! Flow charts, Gantt charts, Org charts…all with R. We will use packages such as nomnoml and DiagrammeR to achieve these ends.
